no.ntnu.fp.net.co
Interface Connection

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConnection, ConnectionImpl, SimpleConnection
public interface Connection

Interface that defines the methods a Connection implementation must support.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Thomas Østerlie

Method Summary
 Connection accept()
          Listens for a connection to be made to this Connection and accepts it.
 void close()
          Closes this connection
 void connect(java.net.InetAddress remoteAddress, int remotePort)
          Connects to a remote instance.
 java.lang.String receive()
          Synchronous receive of message from remote instance.
 void send(java.lang.String msg)
          Send a message to a remote instance.
 

Method Detail

connect

void connect(java.net.InetAddress remoteAddress,
             int remotePort)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.net.SocketTimeoutException
Connects to a remote instance.

Parameters:
remoteAddress - address of remote instance
remotePort - port remote instance is listening to
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the connection
java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if timeout expires before connection is completed.

accept

Connection accept()
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.net.SocketTimeoutException
Listens for a connection to be made to this Connection and accepts it.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when waiting for a connection
java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if the timeout has been reached

send

void send(java.lang.String msg)
          throws java.net.ConnectException,
                 java.io.IOException
Send a message to a remote instance.

Parameters:
msg - the message to be sent
Throws:
java.net.ConnectException - if no remote instance is connected
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when sending

receive

java.lang.String receive()
                         throws java.net.ConnectException,
                                java.io.IOException
Synchronous receive of message from remote instance. Blocks until a message is received.

Returns:
the received message
Throws:
java.net.ConnectException - if no remote instance is connected
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when sending

close

void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
Closes this connection

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when closing this connection
